message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specific details just yet, I assure you it's worth no less than $1500000 to me. I'm confident this product has the potential to generate significant returns for you. To demonstrate my confidence in its value, I'm offering it to you at a price of $2000000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision soon.
